summary: Diff adds a Web Control Quick Tools panel, introduces a shared audit execution wrapper for Web Control terminal commands, and begins a data-driven command catalog used by the World Wide Web Controller command registry (with enhanced help output). Diff summary also indicates unrelated additions around World Wide Web Controller role management hooks/panels that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure every Web Control terminal command (existing and newly added) attempts best-effort audit recording using the existing helper pattern and never fails solely because audit logging is unavailable.
missing_requirements.reason: While a shared wrapper (executeWithAudit/executeLocalCommand) was added and is used by at least some commands (e.g., help/clear and web-controller-status), the diff is truncated and does not show that all existing and newly generated Web Control commands are consistently wrapped to attempt audit recording.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide at least 200 distinct Web Control commands discoverable via help, using a data-driven catalog, and keep help readable/responsive via grouping.
missing_requirements.reason: A data-driven catalog file and help grouping/count output were added, but the diff is truncated before showing the full catalog generation and the final registry size; it is not directly evidenced that 200+ distinct commands are actually produced and registered.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend query/mutation hooks for listing/granting/revoking World Wide Web Controller roles (role administration functionality).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on expanding the safe Web Control terminal and adding a Web Control quick tools section; it explicitly constrains against adding security/app-controller-only capabilities to Web Control and does not request new role management features.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an App Controller-only UI panel/section for World Wide Web Controller management inside the AdminDashboard.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-79..REQ-82; this is additional role administration UI beyond the requested safe Web Control terminal expansion and Web Control quick tools section.
